==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|しょく|もつ|sort=しょくもつ}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょくもつ}} {{m|zh|食物|tr=zyik mjut|lit=eat + thing}}. Possible alteration from strict [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading ''jikimotsu'', changing [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] ''jiki'' for [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] ''shoku''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|しょくもつ|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しょくもつ}}

# [[food]], [[foodstuff]]
# {{qualifier|more broadly}} [[food]] and [[drink]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|食品|しょくひん}}
* {{ja-r|食べ物|たべもの}}

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-r|食物繊維|しょくもつ せんい}}: [[dietary]] [[fiber]]
* {{ja-r|食物連鎖|しょくもつ れんさ}}: a [[food chain]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|じき|もつ}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょくもつ}} {{m|zh|食物|tr=zyik mjut|lit=eat + thing}}. Possible original reading.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|じきもつ|acc=2}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じきもつ}}

# {{qualifier|rare}} [[food]], [[foodstuff]]

=====Usage notes=====
The ''shokumotsu'' reading is more common.

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|しょく|ぶつ}}
From {{etyl|zh|ja}} {{m|zh|食物}}. Possible reborrowing, or change influenced by later contact with China after borrowing of earlier [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading ''jikimotsu''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|しょくぶつ|acc=2}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しょくぶつ}}

# {{qualifier|rare}} [[food]], [[foodstuff]]

=====Usage notes=====
The ''shokumotsu'' reading is more common.  The ''shokubutsu'' reading is generally avoided, due to the potential for confusion with the more-common term {{m|ja|植物|tr=shokubutsu||plant, plant life}}.

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|た|o1=べ|もの|sort=たべもの}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=たべもの|食べ|tr1=tabe|t1=stem noun form of verb {{m|ja|食べる|tr=taberu||to eat}}: eating|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

For disambiguation, this is more commonly written with the [[送り仮名|okurigana]] {{ja-l|べ}} in the middle as {{l|ja|食べ物}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|たべもの|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5|acc2=2|acc2_ref=DJR,NHK,SMK5}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|たべもの}}

# {{ja-def|食べ物}} [[food]] in general; a specific food; one's [[diet]]
#: See {{l|ja|食べ物}} for more detail.

===Etymology 5===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|く|o1=い|もの}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くいもの|食い|tr1=kui|t1=stem noun form of informal verb {{m|ja|食う|tr=kuu||to eat}}: eating|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

For disambiguation, this is more commonly written with the [[送り仮名|okurigana]] {{ja-l|い}} in the middle as {{l|ja|食い物}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くいもの|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5,NHK|acc2=4|acc2_ref=NHK}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|くいもの|hhira=くひもの}}

# {{ja-def|食い物}} [[food]]; a [[sexual partner]]; a [[patsy]], someone tricked into being used for someone else's gain
#: See {{l|ja|食い物}} for more detail.

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|くいもの|hhira=くひもの}}

# {{ja-def|食い物}} to [[cook]], to [[prepare]] food
#: See {{l|ja|食い物}} for more detail.

===Etymology 6===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|く|o1=らい|もの}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くらいもの|食らい|tr1=kurai|t1=stem noun form of informal verb {{m|ja|食らう|tr=kurau||to eat, to drink}}: eating, drinking|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

For disambiguation, this is more commonly written with the [[送り仮名|okurigana]] {{ja-l|ら}}{{ja-l|い}} in the middle as {{l|ja|食らい物}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くらいもの}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|くらいもの|hhira=くらひもの}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=くらいもの|rare|possibly|_|obsolete}} {{ja-def|食らい物}} [[food]] and [[beverage]]

===Etymology 7===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|は|o1=み|もの}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=はみもの|食み|tr1=hami|t1=stem noun form of verb {{m|ja|食む|tr=hamu||to chew; to eat; to suck down; to incur a loss}}: eating|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

For disambiguation, this is written with the [[送り仮名|okurigana]] {{ja-l|み}} in the middle as {{l|ja|食み物}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|はみもの}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|はみもの}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=はみもの|rare|possibly|_|obsolete}} {{ja-def|食み物}} [[food]]; more specifically, [[fodder]] or [[feed]] for animals

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|fodder, animal food}} {{ja-r|餌|えさ}}

===Etymology 8===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|お|o1=し|もの}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=おしもの|食し|tr1=oshi|t1=stem noun form of [[尊敬語#Japanese|honorific]] verb {{m|ja|食す|tr=osu||to eat, to drink|pos=honorific}}: eating, drinking|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

For disambiguation, this is written with the [[送り仮名|okurigana]] {{ja-l|し}} in the middle as {{l|ja|食し物}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|おしもの}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|おしもの|hhira=をしもの}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=はみもの|rare|possibly|_|obsolete|formal|_|honorific}} {{ja-def|食し物}} {{qualifier|rare}} [[food]] and [[beverage]]
